features.description: Allows vendors to apply percentage and flat rate discounts.

subFeatures.name: Percentage Discount
subFeatures.description: Allows percentage-based discounts.

subFeatures.name: Flat Discount
subFeatures.description: Allows flat rate discounts.

features.description: Manage the products available for sale, including stock and pricing.

subFeatures.name: Product Categories
subFeatures.description: Organize products into categories.

subFeatures.name: Product Variants
subFeatures.description: Allows vendors to add variants (e.g., size, color) to products.

features.description: Handle customer orders, including processing, tracking, and fulfillment.

subFeatures.name: Order Tracking
subFeatures.description: Enables tracking of customer orders.

subFeatures.name: Order Fulfillment
subFeatures.description: Manages the process of fulfilling customer orders.

features.description: Manage shipping methods, rates, and delivery times.

subFeatures.name: Shipping Methods
subFeatures.description: Configure shipping options for customers.

subFeatures.name: Shipping Rates
subFeatures.description: Calculate shipping costs based on location and weight.

features.description: Allow customers to leave reviews and ratings on products.

subFeatures.name: Product Reviews
subFeatures.description: Enable customers to leave written reviews on products.

subFeatures.name: Star Ratings
subFeatures.description: Allow customers to give star ratings to products.

features.description: Generate and manage coupon codes for discounts.

subFeatures.name: Percentage Coupons
subFeatures.description: Allows percentage-based discount codes.

subFeatures.name: Flat Coupons
subFeatures.description: Allows flat-rate discount codes.

features.description: Provides detailed reports on sales, customers, and site performance.

subFeatures.name: Sales Reports
subFeatures.description: Detailed reports on product and order sales.

subFeatures.name: Customer Analytics
subFeatures.description: Track customer behaviors and purchases.

features.description: Track and manage product stock levels in real-time.

subFeatures.name: Stock Tracking
subFeatures.description: Tracks product stock levels and alerts when stock is low.

subFeatures.name: Stock Alerts
subFeatures.description: Send alerts to vendors when stock levels are low.

features.description: Integrate multiple payment gateways for customer transactions.

subFeatures.name: Credit Card Payments
subFeatures.description: Accept payments via credit card.

subFeatures.name: Digital Wallets
subFeatures.description: Accept payments via digital wallets.

features.description: Recover sales by sending reminders to customers with abandoned carts.

subFeatures.name: Cart Reminders
subFeatures.description: Send automated reminders to customers with abandoned carts.

subFeatures.name: Recovery Discounts
subFeatures.description: Offer discounts to recover abandoned carts.

features.description: Implement a customer loyalty program to reward frequent buyers.

subFeatures.name: Points System
subFeatures.description: Customers earn points for every purchase.

subFeatures.name: Rewards Redemption
subFeatures.description: Customers can redeem points for discounts or gifts.

features.description: Enabling Multi Stores Options Can Apply Extra Charges
